name: alldebrid-ts
description: Modern TypeScript SDK for AllDebrid API

scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/sdk build && bun run --cwd packages/cli build
scripts.dev: bun run --cwd packages/sdk dev & bun run --cwd packages/cli dev
scripts.typecheck: bun run --cwd packages/sdk typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/cli typecheck
